description: This dashboard provides a general overview on all of Earn's products.

panels.description: Total Valued Locked in Yearn's yEarn products. This sum includes y.curve.fi (v2) & busd.curve.fi (v3).
panels.title: TVL Earn v2 & v3

panels.description: Daily change in TVL in Yearn's yEarn products. This sum includes y.curve.fi (v2) & busd.curve.fi (v3).
panels.title: Daily Delta

panels.description: Weekly change in TVL in Yearn's yEarn products. This sum includes y.curve.fi (v2) & busd.curve.fi (v3).
panels.title: Weekly Delta

panels.description: Monthly change in TVL in Yearn's yEarn products. This sum includes y.curve.fi (v2) & busd.curve.fi (v3).
panels.title: Monthly Delta

panels.description: TVL locked in Earn v2. You can shift + right-click on v2 AUM to exclude it from the graph (making it look nicer)
panels.title: y.curve.fi (v2) Earn - TVL

panels.description: Daily Change in TVL locked in Earn v2. You can shift + right-click on v2 AUM to exclude it from the graph (making it look nicer)
panels.title: y.curve.fi (v2) Earn - TVL Daily

panels.description: TVL locked in Earn v3. You can shift + right-click on v3 AUM to exclude it from the graph (making it look nicer)
panels.title: busd.curve.fi (v3) Earn - TVL

panels.description: Daily Change in TVL locked in Earn v3. You can shift + right-click on v2 AUM to exclude it from the graph (making it look nicer)
panels.title: busd.curve.fi (v3) Earn - TVL Daily

panels.description: Rate of increase of Earn's Share Price. If this goes up, that Earn product is compounding their yield gained from lending! This view helps normalize and show lending yield gained compared to other Earn products. The larger the spikes the more yield gain at that time from lending which was reinvested into the Earn product. The table shows the max value harvested for the timeframe selected.
panels.title: Share Price - Rate of Increase

panels.description: The current price of Earn's lp token should increase steadily as the lending yield is compounded in the Earn pool.
panels.title: Share Price

panels.description: The rate of change of the yEarn's share price over 1 day annualized for better visualization.
panels.title: Price Per Share - 1d Annualized

targets.expr: iearn{param="price per share", vault=~".*v2"} - iearn{param="price per share", vault=~".*v2"} offset 1d
(iearn{param="price per share", vault=~".*v2"} / iearn{param="price per share", vault=~".*v2"} offset 1d ) - 1
iearn{param="price per share", vault=~".*v3"} - iearn{param="price per share", vault=~".*v3"} offset 1d
(iearn{param="price per share", vault=~".*v3"} / iearn{param="price per share", vault=~".*v3"} offset 1d ) - 1

panels.description: Amount in the Earn pool for each product. Amounts are shown in terms of the deposit token and not in the dollar amount. This shows lent-out and unlent-out coins for the pools.
panels.title: Total Balance

panels.description: Amount in the Earn pool for each product. Amounts are shown in terms of the deposit token and not in dollar amount.
panels.title: Lent Out Supply

panels.description: This shows the balance that has yet to be deposited into a lender protocol.

targets.expr: sum by (vault) (iearn{param="pooled balance"}) - sum by (vault) (iearn{param="total supply"})

panels.title: Unlent Supply

title: Earn
